home.title: Trusted Tent & Event Rentals in the Eastern Townships
home.subtitle: With 30+ years of experience Locaplus delivers reliable tent event rentals to make your event unforgettable.
requestQuote.title: Request a quote
about.title: Transforming Moments into Memories, Rain or Shine
about.section1.title: 30+ Years of Trusted Excellence
about.section1.description: Since 1991, Locaplus has been a trusted partner in event rentals across Quebec. With decades of experience, we bring reliability and dedication to every event, from intimate gatherings to large-scale festivals.
about.section2.title: Create the Perfect Event with Us
about.section2.description: Every event is an opportunity to create something special. Let us help you design the perfect atmosphere with our wide range of high-quality event rentals and personalized service.
about.section3.title: Your Vision, Our Commitment
about.section3.description: At Locaplus, we understand that every event is unique. Our team works closely with you to ensure each detail aligns with your vision, delivering a truly personalized experience that meets your needs and expectations.
about.section4.title: Event Equipment Tailored to Your Needs
about.section4.description: From elegant tents and marquees to tables, chairs, flooring, and more, Locaplus offers a full range of rentals to make your event unforgettable with locations in Sherbrooke, St. Alphonse de Granby, and Cowansville.
about.section5.title: Official distributor/installer for Tempo in the Eastern Townships
about.section5.description: Locaplus is the official Tempo dealer in the Eastern Townships, providing sales, distribution, and expert installation.
products.title: We've got you covered
products.description: Premium tents, stylish furniture, and all the essentials to make your event seamless and unforgettable.
contact.title: Have Questions? Ask Us!
contact.description: Get in touch with Locaplus for tent and event rentals in Bromont, Granby, South Shore, Sherbrooke, and Magog. Call us, email us, orvisit our Saint-Alphonse-de-Granby office. Request your quote today to start planning your event!
